alert.note: Alert for Codington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 4:00PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Mud Creek near Rauville affecting Codington County. .The following river forecasts include forecast precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any additional future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mud Creek near Rauville. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:00 PM CDT Monday was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued on Tuesday.
